column4: hello...i'm looking for help installing my Wireless card, which is a WMP54G
when I type  $modeprobe ndiswrapper...I receive: "FATAL: Error inserting ndiswrapper (/lib/modules/2.6.10-5-386/kernel/drivers/net/ndiswrapper/ndiswrapper.ko): Operation not permitted
did you ensure it isn't already inserted?
